Title: Dry Martina
Actors: Antonella Costa, Patricio Contreras, Dindi Jane, Pedro Campos
Plot: Martina was a famous singer in Argentina during the late 90s, who's become completely frigid and disenchanted with love. The arrival of a so-called sister, alongside her attractive boyfriend, compel Martina to go to Chile with one objective in mind: getting back her libido.
